accessId.title: Tuya Access ID
accessId.description: The Access ID for your Tuya OpenAPI project

accessKey.title: Tuya Access Key
accessKey.description: The Access Key for your Tuya OpenAPI project

username.title: Tuya Username
username.description: Your Tuya account username (usually your email address)

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Country code for your account (e.g., '49' for Germany)

protocolVersion.title: Tuya Protocol Version
protocolVersion.description: Select the Tuya protocol version for your device

telegramBotToken.title: Telegram Bot Token
telegramBotToken.description: Telegram Bot Token for push notifications

localKey.title: Tuya Device Local Key
localKey.description: Local key for local device communication

ipAddress.title: Device IP Address
ipAddress.description: IP address of the Tuya device

powerValueId.title: Power Value ID
powerValueId.description: DPS ID that represents power consumption

startValue.title: Start Value
startValue.description: Expected power value when the device starts the cycle

startDuration.title: Start Duration
startDuration.description: Duration in seconds that the start value needs to hold until the device is considered active.

endValue.title: End Value
endValue.description: Expected power value when the device finishes the cycle

endDuration.title: End Duration
endDuration.description: Duration in seconds that the end value needs to hold until the device is considered inactive.

startMessage.title: Start Message
startMessage.description: Optional push message when the device starts the cycle

endMessage.title: End Message
endMessage.description: Push message when the device ends the cycle

exposeStateSwitch.title: Expose State Switch
exposeStateSwitch.description: Creates dummy switch that will indicate the current device status, useful for extra automation
